mapper.select: select d.dec_date, d.dec_num, d.mem_id, d.dec_targetId, d.meet_Num, d.dec_type, d.dec_targetNum, d.dec_content, d.dec_admin, d.dec_state, s.sct_type from declaration d left outer join sanctions s on d.dec_num =s.dec_num order by dec_num desc LIMIT #{param1} OFFSET #{param2}

select.if: select meet_subject from meeting where meet_num=#{param2}
select cmt_content from comment where cmt_num=#{param2}
select rev_subject from review where rev_num=#{param2}

mapper.insert: insert into sanctions(dec_num, mem_id, sct_type, sct_content,sct_admin) value (#{dec_num}, #{mem_id}, #{sct_type}, #{sct_content},#{sct_admin})
mapper.update: update declaration set dec_state = 1 where dec_num = #{param1}
mapper.select: select a.meet_subject, a.meet_gatherStart, a.meet_gatherEnd, b.ad_num, b.ad_meetArea, b.ad_state from meeting as a inner join advertisement as b on a.meet_num =b.meet_num order by b.ad_num desc LIMIT #{param1} OFFSET #{param2}
